Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Good morning.


It does not matter that it is nighttime.
As far as I'm concerned, whenever you
awaken, it is a good morning.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Pardon me...<sp:0:4:0>If you intend to stay, I ask that you speak
to me from across the counter.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you interested in staying here? If so,
I ask that you speak to me from across
the counter.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Apologies, but you do not have the
necessary funds for this transaction.<sp:5:1:0>
You must pay or journey elsewhere.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That bed will completely cure you of the
wearying fatigue from your journey.<sp:5:0:0>
Enjoy your invigorating rest.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is a village where many different
folks gather.<sp:0:4:0>I offer pleasant sleep to all, regardless
of their rank or where they come from,
by the mercy of the Goddess Hylia.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>Hm. <sp:5:0:0>Would you like to select a different
bed to sleep upon?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, a customer. How interesting that you
should arrive at this particular time.

To seek me out at this time of day... If I
may dare to assume...you must be a
Hylian of the nocturnal variety, yes?
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, humble servant led here by destiny...
Are you in need of a place of respite?
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, a customer. How interesting that you 
should arrive at this particular time.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>If I may dare to assume...<sp:5:1:0> You must be a
Hylian of the nocturnal... Nay, diurnal...
Ah! The crepuscular variety, yes?
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Understood. At what time would you like
to return to the land of waking?
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, a customer. How interesting that you
should arrive at this particular time.

To seek me out at such an hour... If I may
dare to assume...you must be a Hylian of
the diurnal variety, yes?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That bed will slowly but surely cure you of
the wearying fatigue from your journey.<sp:5:0:0>
Enjoy your peaceful rest.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>A regular bed will cost you <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.
A water bed costs <clr:0000>30 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>By the mercy of the Goddess Hylia, I hope
you have a most pleasant journey.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It is a special bed that ensures the best
sleep possible by maintaining your
posture according to your anatomy.
Compared to a regular bed, it offers your
mind and body an awakening <clr:0000>that is very
vital <clr:ffff>indeed.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Good morning.


It does not matter that it is noon. As far
as I'm concerned, whenever you awaken,
it is a good morning.
